About Automic's CA Agile Central Package ================================ CA Agile Central is an enterprise-class platform that's purpose-built for scaling agile development practices. It provides a hub for teams to collaboratively plan, prioritize and track work on a synchronized cadence. With this package we automate the following: * Create/Edit/Bulk edit/Delete a user story. * Add attachment/comment to the work item. * Export the work items
=Supported CA Agile Central versions= v2.0
=Setup= * This action pack supports Windows as well as UNIX Agent OS. * Oracle JRE 1.7 or higher must be installed on Agent OS and "java" must be set as executable on the same. * The Agent should be able to access CA Agile Central rest api endpoint URL in order to make HTTP(s) requests. * Connection details for Agile Central should be known to the user.
=Variables= PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_AGILECENTRAL.PUB.VARA.PACKAGE_PARAMETERS * API version and https port can be configured in this VARA based on your environment.
=Actions= Following actions are supported for CA AGILE CENTRAL.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_AGILECENTRAL.PUB.ACTION.DELETE_USER_STORY * Action Description: This action deletes the given user story along with the tasks associated to it.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_AGILECENTRAL.PUB.ACTION.CREATE_USER_STORY * Action Description: This action creates a new user story.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_AGILECENTRAL.PUB.ACTION.EDIT_USER_STORY * Action Description: This action edits a user story.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_AGILECENTRAL.PUB.ACTION.BULK_EDIT_USER_STORIES * Action Description: This action edits one or more user stories.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_AGILECENTRAL.PUB.ACTION.ADD_COMMENT * Action Description: This action adds the comment to provided work Item.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_AGILECENTRAL.PUB.ACTION.CHANGE_USER_STORY_STATUS * Action Description: This action changes the status of provided user story.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_AGILECENTRAL.PUB.ACTION.ADD_ATTACHMENT * Action Description: This action adds file attachment to provided work Item.
